attributes.action: To stop the 'make a baby gain money' culture please sign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For those unscrupulous individuals who churn out more and more children for financial gain should not be rewarded. Therefore possibly saving those unfortunate babies who would be born and neglected. SIMPLE!!!!!!!!!! Those of us who are decent would have babies for no gain except the sheer joy that comes with a family.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
